import React from 'react' import Mainscreen from '../screens/MainScreen' import '../Pages/styles/deviceInfo.css' const API = 'https://us-central1-castory-cases.cloudfunctions.net/getProduct/' class deviceInfo extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { quantity: 1, productInfo: { }, } } async componentDidMount() { const ID = this.props.match.params.id const container = document.querySelector(".deviceInfo-container") await fetch(API + ID) .then(response => response.json()) .then(data => this.setState({productInfo: data, loading: false})) console.log(this.state.productInfo) setTimeout(()=> { const bg_navbar = document.querySelector(".bg-container"); bg_navbar.style.top = "0%" },1000) } render() { return(

{this.state.productInfo.productName}

{this.state.productInfo.productBrand}

{this.state.productInfo.productModel}

${this.state.productInfo.productPrice}.00 MXN

Cantidad:

this.setState({quantity:this.state.quantity - 1})} className="counter-suma">- this.setState({quantity:this.state.quantity + 1})} className="counter-resta">+
) } } export default deviceInfo
